title: Skanska to construct $69M Va. Tech building - Virginia Business Magazine
content: Skanska to construct $69M Va. Tech building  Virginia Business Magazine
description: Virginia Tech’s $69.5 million Undergraduate Science Laboratory Building will be constructed by Skanska and completed by April 2024, the Swedish builder announced Monday. Virginia Tech announced plans for the building in late March, and construction started in April. The 102,000-square-foot building will provide teaching and laboratory space on the university’s Blacksburg campus. It will be…
